author: Patrick Galloway
title: Off the charts: Online gaming hitting huge numbers during pandemic
description: With stay-at-home restrictions in place across Australia, online gaming is set to take a big step towards mainstream adoption.
content:
Posted 
April 09, 2020 15:11:35
Even before the coronavirus pandemic, most Australian parents would agree that online gaming was a lot more than just a growing trend.
